segments.text: I was wondering if I could borrow the company van for a fundraiser this weekend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , I think that would be possible . Where is the fundraiser ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is in the park downtown .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you need it for both Saturday and Sunday ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We will need it for Saturday only .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think that would be OK . Who will be driving it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mary and I will be driving the van .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you drop it off on Sunday night ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we can do that . Can we borrow the chairs from the lunchroom also ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , that would be fine . Just make sure that everything is returned by Sunday night .
segments.speaker: S2
